blog.name: mara-jade-skyvalker
blog.title: Mara Jade
blog.description: Emperor's Hand to Jedi Master and wife of Luke Skywalker ~no one in Star Wars has taken such a journey...

summary: Mara Jade has been instructed to eliminate the Rebel hero, Luke Skywalker. Once the Emperor's Hand has infiltrated Jabba's...
body: Mara Jade has been instructed to eliminate the Rebel hero, Luke Skywalker. Once the Emperor’s Hand has infiltrated Jabba’s Palace as the dancing girl ‘Arica,’ her task becomes increasingly difficult upon the discovery of a well-disguised Princess Leia Organa. Leia’s bold plan to rescue Han Solo has left the Hutt’s entire court on edge. However, this development does little to discourage the mighty Jabba who insists the show must go on. What a show it will be!

What a show it will be!

blog.title: AO3Feed-The Force Awakens
blog.description: Fan fiction for Star Wars: The Force Awakens

summary: In a Galaxy Far, Far Away........
title: In a Galaxy Far, Far Away........
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BuhRIi

by Tygermane

I use my OC, but, the name can be changed to reflect being a reader insert.

Misha/reader, is a young woman, from the unknown planet, Earth. She is kidnapped from her home planet in the Milky Way, transported across light years of Space, to where the First Order is gaining power. And a young Armitage Hux is attending the First Order academy on his home planet, of Arkaniss.

After surviving two years of experimentation by her abductors, she is finally sold as a slave into the Pleasure Industry. She is fortunate enough to be purchased by Admiral Hux, as a “gift” his son. She quickly becomes a very important and infulential figure in his life, helping grow stronger and more self confident.

Words: 637, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of The Earthling

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death, Rape/Non-Con
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Armitage Hux, Reader, Original Female Character(s), Original Male Character(s), Original Female Human Character(s), Brendol Hux
  • Relationships: Armitage Hux/Reader, Armitage Hux/You, Armitage Hux/Original Female Character(s), General Hux/Reader, General Hux/You, General Hux/Original Female Character(s), Armitage Hux/Original Female Character(s)/You
  • Additional Tags: Reader-Insert, Kidnapping, Sexual Assault, Attempted Sexual Assault, Loss of Faith, Angst, Fluff, Hux Backstory, Hux-centric, Armitage Hux Needs A Hug, Armitage Hux Has Issues, Brendol Hux’s A+ Parenting, Self-Defense, Self-Esteem Issues, Self-Acceptance, Self-Doubt, loss of family, Family Loss, Cadet Hux, hux is a teenager, Comfort, Grief/Mourning, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Not Canon Compliant, Canon Universe, Pre-Star Wars: The Force Awakens

blog.name: roguedarthskywalker
blog.title: In Another Life
blog.description: Fanfics, art, humor and all manners of Star Wars Prequel and Anidala. Feel free to send in prompts, recs, and whatever else you feel like!

body:
I’m Making a Website

The tumblr purge is making it difficult for us Anidala fans to get our explicit content! And there are just too few Anidala fan sites in general.

I’m in the beginning stages of making a content site on Wordpress so we can better enjoy and share our stuff from general audiences to explicit.

At this point I have a solid wireframe and a basic link set up for content (which was a little more difficult than I originally thought it would be because Wordpress is a bit of a pain to navigate) but after a bit of CSS programming and filter set ups, I expect to go live in a few days!

If you’re interested in being a contributor to the posted content let me know and once the site goes live I’ll fill you in on how to make your posts!
